speaker: Krishna
title: AI Show | Oct 22 | Translator now supports 100+ languages and dialects | Episode 36
description:
Krishna Doss and Mohamed Elghazali join Ayşegül Yönet to showcase how to break language barriers with Custom Translator, now supporting 100+ languages and dialects! https://aka.ms/AzureTranslatorDocs
